title: What type of person are you?
description: Do you keep asking yourself, who am I? Answer a few questions in this quiz about your personality, career options, and favorite hobbies to find out what type of person you are! You could be an imaginative, strategic architect or the poetic, calm mediator. No matter what the case is, you are unique. Let's get started!

blue.information: You are imaginative, decisive, ambitious, and curious. You are a strategic thinker, and you have a plan for everything. You also have an incredible thirst for knowledge, and you love exploring and learning new things.

red.information: You are poetic, kind, generous, idealistic, and calm. You have a reserved attitude, but you have strong principles that you always stand up for. You are also practical, but you manage to stay positive and maintain your strong drive.

yellow.information: You are smart, energetic, conscious, and intelligent. You are a hard worker, and you enjoy taking risks. You enjoy drama, but you often maintain a good sense of humor if your plans don't turn out the way you want them to. However, you can be quite emotional because you are so passionate about certain things.

green.information: You are persistent, patient, passionate and disciplined. You have a reserved attitude, and you enjoy taking risks. However, you can be quite emotional because you are so passionate about certain things.

questions.title: How would you describe your personality?
Which career would you rather pursue?
What is your favorite film genre?
